nodes.text: This Tarkin Initiative base was where the BT-1 assassin droid was created. Sometime before the secret mission to Geonosis, the BT-1 prototype, revealed to be homicidal, killed everyone in the base and then set it to self-destruct, as the assassin droid jettisoned into space. The droid was at some point after the destruction found by Doctor Aphra and reactivated, now with a readjusted behavior and it was ordered to serve under Darth Vader.
The Tarkin Initiative base first appeared in a flashback in Darth Vader 3, written by Kieron Gillen and pencilled by Salvador Larroca.
